(:action collect_water_from_faucet
    :parameters (?faucet - faucet ?container - container)
    :precondition (and

    :effect (and
              (full ?container)
              (not (empty ?container)))
)

#### Action 4: enter_home
```lisp

(:action enter_home
    :parameters (?npc - character ?home - place)
    :precondition (and
                    (location ?npc ?home)
                    (safety_level ?npc safe)
                    (status ?home door_open))
    :effect (and
             (location ?npc inside_home)
             (status ?home door_closed))
  )
```
